title: Cassiopeia w bug
body: When cassiopeia does her w, for some reason its invisible to our team. The enemy team states they can see it but when I was playing in a group of 4, all of us couldn't see the w but it still works. It wasn't fair as our team would all walk into it and we would get rekt just because of a slow and poison we couldn't see. I don't know if this happens to others but if it is, it needs to be fixed, ty :)

replies.body:
This is a known bug. Dunno if Riot are working on it.

Bug reports should go [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report), and if possible, include the exact conditions in which it happens.
OMG i have that same problem. I was playing this game with a full premade and i just kept walking into that stupid W. Fix plox Riot {{item:3070}}
